mapper.select: SELECT AcuntId , UserType , UserId , Pw , UseYn , RegDt , LeaveDt , ExpirDt , TermsUse , TermsPersn , TermsEvent , InsDt FROM TB_Acunt WHERE AcuntId = #{acuntId}
SELECT AcuntId , Pw , UseYn , RegDt , LeaveDt , ExpirDt , TermsUse , TermsPersn , TermsEvent , InsDt FROM TB_Acunt WHERE UserType = #{userType} AND UserId = #{userId}

SELECT AcuntId , UserType , UserId , Pw , UseYn , RegDt , LeaveDt , ExpirDt , TermsUse , TermsPersn , TermsEvent FROM TB_Acunt WHERE (AcuntId = case when IFNULL(#{acuntId}, '') = '' then AcuntId else #{acuntId} end) LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_Acunt WHERE (AcuntId = CASE WHEN IFNULL(#{acuntId}, 0) = 0 THEN AcuntId ELSE #{acuntId} END)

FROM TB_Acunt WHERE (AcuntId = CASE WHEN IFNULL(#{acuntId}, 0) = 0 THEN AcuntId ELSE #{acuntId} END)
